mapper.insert: insert into users (user_name, password, branch_id, auth_code) values(#{name}, #{password}, #{branchId}, 0)
mapper.select: select user_no as no, user_name as name from users where user_name = #{value}
SELECT user_no AS no, user_name AS name, branch_id AS branchId, auth_code AS authCode FROM users ORDER BY authCode, user_no DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM users WHERE auth_code = '0'
mapper.update: update users set auth_code = #{authCode} where user_no = #{no}
